Season One // Hokuriku Arch

Newsletter entries from my walk across eight cities in Japan located roughly in the area covered by the Hokuriku Arch JR Pass.

  • 8 cities in Japan + Hong Kong
  • 14 days, from 20 October to 2 November 2022
  • 310,250 steps
  • 253.2 kilometers
  • 8,584 words
  • 1 backpack, 1 camera, 1 lens
  • 4 pizza toasts
  • and more...

Newsletter dispatches

  • Season One Finale
    02 November 2022
    Day fourteen — Hong Kong. Final tally.
  • One Last Pizza Toast
    01 November 2022
    Day thirteen — Kyoto, Hong Kong. Last day of the trip. Last pizza toast. Best conversation.
  • The Uji Excursion
    31 October 2022
    Day twelve — Kyoto, Uji. Japan has just re-opened after COVID, and Kyoto is already packed. Need to escape the crowds.
  • Avoid Kyoto, He Said
    30 October 2022
    Day eleven — Kyoto. Visiting Kyoto before the regular crowds arrive again.
  • Population 66,123
    29 October 2022
    Day ten — Kanazwa, Tsuruga, and my final station. Train rides, hikes, and some akitendon.
  • Opulence Where You Least Expect It
    28 October 2022
    Day nine — Kanazwa. Easy day, simple meals, complicated answers.
  • In Search of Nodoguro
    27 October 2022
    Day eight — Kanazwa. Time to meet the king of white fish.
  • Izakaya Shinkansen
    26 October 2022
    Day seven — Karuizawa, Kanazwa. Most kilometers walked in a day on this trip so far.
  • Tranquility, Peace, Calm, Pamper
    25 October 2022
    Day six — Karuizawa. A mid-trip pit stop.
  • Banged Up
    24 October 2022
    Day five — Matsumoto, Nagano, Karuizawa. Eventful day with 3 cities, 3 coffees, and 2 matcha teas. Overcaffeinated and tired.
  • The Margherita Pizza Toast
    23 October 2022
    Day four — Matsumoto. My first pizza toast of the trip!
  • Well Well Wells
    22 October 2022
    Day three — Matsumoto. Following Craig's Mod recommendation to the legendary kissa Coffee Abe.
  • Friday Night, Good Time
    21 October 2022
    Day two — Tokyo, Matsumoto. Believe it or not, but a boozy encounter with yakuza was my highlight of the day.
  • It Feels Different
    20 October 2022
    Day one — Hong Kong, Tokyo. First steps on a trip emulating Craig Mod's "Tiny Barber, Post Office" walk through Japan's mid-tier cities.
